requirements.title: Multi-language storage
requirements.description: Store algorithm implementations in Python, JavaScript, Go, Java, C++

validation.notes: Schema supports multi-language, 58 algorithms seeded, 31 implementations

requirements.title: Algorithm execution
requirements.description: Execute and validate algorithms using Judge0 resource

validation.notes: Local executor fallback for Python/JS/Go/Java/C++ when Judge0 unavailable

requirements.title: Search capability
requirements.description: Provide search by algorithm name, category, and complexity

validation.notes: Search API working with filters, supports both 'q' and 'query' parameters

requirements.title: API endpoints
requirements.description: API endpoints for algorithm retrieval and validation

validation.notes: All endpoints functional including improved validation

requirements.title: CLI tool
requirements.description: CLI for testing custom implementations against library

validation.notes: CLI working with all commands: search, get, categories, stats, health

requirements.title: PostgreSQL storage
requirements.description: PostgreSQL storage for algorithms, metadata, and test results

validation.notes: Database populated with 35 algorithms, 48 test cases

requirements.title: Performance benchmarking
requirements.description: Performance benchmarking with time/space complexity analysis

validation.notes: Benchmark endpoint and CLI command implemented

requirements.title: Execution trace
requirements.description: Visual algorithm execution trace for debugging

validation.notes: Trace endpoint implemented with step-by-step execution visualization

requirements.title: Contribution system
requirements.description: Contribution system for adding new algorithms

validation.notes: Full contribution API with submit, review, and approval workflow
Compare API endpoint implemented with summary statistics

requirements.title: n8n integration
requirements.description: Integration with n8n for automated testing workflows

validation.notes: n8n workflow created with fallback to local execution
